attributes.action: Sack Dianne Abbott for making racist statements
attributes.additional_details:
"White people love playing 'divide & rule'. We should not play their game  #tacticasoldascolonialism" - Dianne Abbott

This is a quote from a leading newspaper on 5th January 2011, reporting on the comments made by Diane Abbott on Twitter. Racism like this cannot be tolerated and she must be removed from office without further discussion. Please show your support and sign this petition
